64274.summary: Some customers in the Seafair area of Richmond are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
64274.title: July 19 - Richmond (Seafair) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Teams have confirmed a power outage is present in the area affecting our equipment. Please refer to your local power company for any updates. Once power is restored, services in the area should begin working. Our next update will be after the power is restored. Thank you for your patience.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
